name: incestuous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
involving incest: The film is about Auteil's incestuous love for his sister.
disapproving involving only a close or limited group of people, who do not communicate or do business with people outside the group: incestuous relationship Journalists and politicians often have a rather incestuous relationship.
